entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to snow or ice pellets after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
